featured.text: The room’s thin plastic walls easily transmit the sound of snoring made by neighboring guests.

definition.zh_def: 打鼾，指在睡眠中發出的粗重呼吸聲。
definition.en_def: To breathe noisily during sleep, typically due to obstruction of the air passages.
definition.example: He tends to snore loudly, which keeps everyone awake at night.
